entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
